posts.post_content:
The following T206s are for sale. I prefer PayPal (friends/family): [url]jason@jasonstricker.com[/url].

All prices are delivered.

SALE PENDING
Chase, white cap throwing, Piedmont 150: SOLD!

MOVED TO EBAY
Karger, Sweet Caporal 150
O'Hara, NY, Piedmont 350
White, pitching, Piedmont 350 (partially erased writing)
Wiltse, portrait no cap, Piedmont 150

[IMG]http://www.t206blog.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/T206-Chase-white-cap-Piedmont-150.jpg[/IMG]

All cards have been reduced, many at or under cost.

I prefer PayPal (friends/family), but will accept checks, money orders and cash. 

Thanks!
Final reductions have been made. Looking to move these, thanks!

Chase is on hold for a fellow board member.

The rest have been moved to eBay: [url]http://www.ebay.com/sch/agent001/m.html?_nkw=&_armrs=1&_ipg=&_from=[/url]
